import classes from "./CartItem.module.css"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux/es/hooks/useSelector"; const CartItem = (props) => { // const { title, quantity, total, price } = props.item; const data = useSelector((state) => state.cart.cart); return ( <>

    ${data[0].total.toFixed(2)}{" "} (${data[0].price.toFixed(2)}/item)
    x {data[0].quantity}
